experiences.name: Chilean Museum of Pre-Columbian Art
experiences.desc: World-class pre-Columbian art museum, indigenous artifacts, interactive exhibits for children
experiences.longDesc: An extraordinary museum showcasing ancient Chilean and South American indigenous cultures. Engaging displays and family programs make history accessible and captivating for all ages.

experiences.name: Torres del Paine National Park
experiences.desc: Iconic Patagonian park, granite towers, turquoise lakes, hiking trails, breathtaking vistas
experiences.longDesc: A stunning UNESCO biosphere reserve featuring dramatic mountain peaks and pristine lakes. Families can enjoy accessible trails, scenic drives, and unforgettable natural beauty.

experiences.name: Salar de Atacama
experiences.desc: Surreal salt landscape, mirror effect in water, otherworldly photo opportunities, guided tours
experiences.longDesc: One of Earth's most alien landscapes, the vast Atacama salt flats offer magical sunsets and floating experiences. Family-friendly tours guide visitors safely through this natural wonder.
